archimate:DataObject.name: TaxExemptionCertificate
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The certificate describing an exemption from tax (partial or complete) granted for a party and/or a place. Examples include: - Party-based - Individual might be exempt due to health or other personal situation - Organization might be exempt due to its business (e.g. a charity; or government) - Location-based - A City might have a global exemption from purchase tax
